Question: Chun Lam Group International Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Chun Lam Group International Limited

Product: Smart Phone accessories, Mobility products and accessories, Computer accessories, Wearables for smart devices, Smart sound devices, Outdoor sport gears, diving sport gears, Motorcar parts, Soft & Hard bags, Waterproof icebags

- Established in 1998
- Owns and manages 8 factories worldwide
- Specializes in manufacturing a wide range of products
- Over 8000 employees
- Business turnover exceeds USD 250 million in 2020 and USD 300 million in 2021
- Trusted by world-class customers from China, USA, Europe, Japan, Korea, Australia
Summary_cn:
春林集团国际有限公司

产品：智能手机配件、移动产品和配件、计算机配件、可穿戴设备、智能音响设备、户外运动装备、潜水装备、摩托车零部件、软硬包、防水冰袋

- 1998年成立
- 在全球拥有和管理8家工厂
- 专注于制造各类产品
- 8000多名员工
- 2020年业务额超过2.5亿美元，2021年业务额超过3亿美元
- 受到来自中国、美国、欧洲、日本、韩国、澳大利亚等世界一流客户的信任
